app_descript:
Brief

MeetMe, formerly known as My Yearbook, is a dynamic social and dating mobile application tailored to help users connect and interact with new people. With an age requirement of 13 years and older, it includes features that foster social engagement through games, profile enhancements, and localized connections. MeetMe's unique virtual economy uses "Lunch Money" as its currency, which can be earned through participation or purchased to spice up user profiles.
